name: RetrieveOrderCustomAttributeDefinition
description:
Retrieve custom attribute definition for a Square order.

Use this tool to fetch a specific custom attribute definition related to an order from a Square seller account. The custom attribute must be set to specific visibility settings to be accessible.

parameters.name: custom_attribute_key
parameters.description: The key of the custom attribute definition to retrieve for an order.

value_schema.description: The key of the custom attribute definition to retrieve.

parameters.name: current_version_of_custom_attribute
parameters.description: Specify the current version of the custom attribute for optimistic concurrency control. Optional.

value_schema.description:
To enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency)
control, include this optional field and specify the current version of the custom attribute.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description:
To enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency)
control, include this optional field and specify the current version of the custom attribute.

value_schema.description:
To enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency)
control, include this optional field and specify the current version of the custom attribute.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the custom attribute definition to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The key of the custom attribute definition to retrieve.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
